introduction: This video explores the impact of AI on human-computer interaction (HCI), focusing on how AI enhances the way we interact with technology. The video covers various techniques such as natural language processing, computer vision, gesture recognition, and emotion detection, which enable machines to understand and interpret human inputs. AI-powered voice recognition and virtual agents are also discussed, providing conversational interfaces that understand user queries, offer recommendations, and perform tasks. Additionally, the video highlights the role of AI in improving accessibility for individuals with disabilities. The future of HCI is further explored, with examples of intelligent user interfaces, predictive user modeling, and immersive technologies that merge the physical and virtual worlds.
